sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"真实"之意。
means: reality ： 侧重指某事物的客观存在的真实性。
truth ： 含义广泛，指符合事实、没有错误或虚假。

sentence.Network_en: He told some lies and sometimes just embroidered the truth.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说了些谎，有时只是对事实添油加醋了一番。

sentence.Network_en: She called the verdict a victory of truth over falsehood.
sentence.Network_cn: 她将这一判决称为真理对谬误的胜利。

sentence.Network_en: They can't destroy truth without destroying each and every one of us.
sentence.Network_cn: 除非他们将我们赶尽杀绝，否则真理不灭。

phrase.cizu_name: to tell the truth (或 truth to tell 或 if truth be t

jx.jx_en_mean: to be frank (used especially when making an admission or when expressing an unwelcome or controversial opinion)

lj.lj_ly: I think, if truth be told, we were all a little afraid of him.
lj.lj_ls: 说老实话，我认为我们当时都有点儿怕他。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English trīewth, trēowth 'faithfulness, constancy' (see true, -th)

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 TRUTH [名侦探柯南TV版 OP5] 播放集数：第124集～第142集 歌手：Two-Mix 作词：永野椎菜 作曲：高山みなみ 编曲：TWO-MIX出处 《名侦探柯南-当红艺人绑架事件》插曲“Break”和第五首片首曲Truth。作者介绍 TWO-MIX 高山南在组合中担任主唱、作曲、编曲；永野椎菜担任键盘手、作词和编曲。作为职业声优高山南在许多我们所熟知的动画作品中为角色配音 高山南(MINAMI TAKAYAMA) 姓名：高山みなみ 中文名：高山 南（又译：

entry.def: The truth about something is all the facts about it, rather than things that are imagined or invented.

example.ex: Is it possible to separate truth from fiction?…
example.tran: 有可能把事实与虚构分开吗？

example.ex: I must tell you the truth about this business...
example.tran: 我必须告诉你这件事的真相。

entry.def: If you say that there is some truth in a statement or story, you mean that it is true, or at least partly true.

example.ex: There is no truth in this story...
Is there any truth to the rumors?...
example.tran: 那些谣言有什么事实依据吗？

entry.def: A truth is something that is believed to be true.

example.ex: It is an almost universal truth that the more we are promoted in a job, the less we actually exercise the skills we initially used to perform it.
example.tran: 这几乎是一条普遍的真理：我们在某一工作中越往上晋升，实际运用那些当初在工作中经常实践的技能的机会就越少。

entry.def: You say in truth in order to indicate that you are giving your honest opinion about something.

example.ex: In truth, we were both unhappy.
example.tran: 事实上，我们俩都不快乐。

entry.def: You say to tell you the truth or truth to tell in order to indicate that you are telling someone something in an open and honest way, without trying to hide anything.

example.ex: To tell you the truth, I was afraid to see him...
Truth to tell, John did not want Veronica at his wedding.
example.tran: 说实在的，约翰不想韦罗妮卡参加他的婚礼。

means.word_mean: 1. a fact that has been verified;

sentences.sentence: "the truth is the he didn't want to do it"
"they debated the truth of the proposition"
"the situation brought home to us the blunt truth of the military threat"
"he was famous for the truth of his portraits"
"he turned to religion in his search for eternal verities"
"he thought of answering with the truth but he knew they wouldn't believe it"

means.word_mean: 4. the quality of nearness to the truth or the true value;

sentences.sentence: "he was beginning to doubt the accuracy of his compass"
"the lawyer questioned the truth of my account"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The truth, perhaps, lies somewhere in between.

auth_sentence.content: But the stats fail to tell the whole truth.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the stats fail to tell the whole truth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the stats fail to tell the whole truth.

auth_sentence.content: Well, certainly there is some truth in that.
auth_sentence.res_content: Well, certainly there is some truth in that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Well, certainly there is some truth in that.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 真实的, 真正的, 忠实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tru相信,真实+e→adj.真实的, 真正的, 忠实的
trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]+ful表形容词→adj.相信的, 信任的
tru相信,真实+ly表副词→adv.真实地, 不假
tru相信,真实+ce→相信对方而停战
dis不+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→n.不相信,怀疑 v.不信任,疑惑
tru相信,真实+ism学术→真实的学术→不言自明的真理
tru相信,真实+th表名词→n.真实,真相;真实性;真理
tru相信,真实+st→n.&v.信任, 信赖
dis不+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→n.不相信,怀疑 v.不信任,疑惑
en给予+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→给予相信→委托

Sentence.sentence: He seldom tells the truth about himself.
The truth is to be found elsewhere.
But Oprah's particular brand of celebrity is not a good fit for the values of a university whose motto(座右铭),Veritas,means truth.
When asked straightforwardly, people tend to lie or shade the truth when the subject is sex, money or employment.

means.word_mean: 事实, 真相, 实情

sentences.en: I'm going to ascertain the truth.
I grant the truth of what he says.
I challenged the truth of their story.
sentences.cn: 我对他们所说情况的真实性表示怀疑。

sentences.en: He was a seeker for truth.
sentences.cn: 他是一个追求真理的人。

sentences.en: I have persuaded him of its truth.
sentences.cn: 我使他相信了其中的真理。

jushi.english: I'm going to ascertain the truth.
Your account of what happened approximates the truth, but there are several small errors.
jushi.chinese: 你对有关发生情况的叙述基本属实,不过其中有几点小差错。

jushi.english: Time sponges out all trace of truth.
jushi.chinese: 时间会抹去真理的一切痕迹。
